about_the_game:
Immersed yourself in an interactive storybook where YOU are the hero.

In this oppressive Lovecraftian universe, the choices you make will be decisive for your survival.
Engage your mind to solve complex puzzles and use your inventory wisely before embarking on turn-based combat.

Take notes, as if you were in a real book, as it could be the key to surviving this adventure.
Dice rolls can help you if you are lucky!

Explore the depths of human psyche in this narrative episode that blends exploration, puzzle-solving, and combats.
But be prepared: madness may await at every page...

IMPORTANT
The main interest of our game lies in the progressive discovery of the plot.

This is why we have chosen not to show you long gameplay sequences or in-game illustrations, in order to preserve the mysterious and captivating aspect of the story.

If you have liked (or still appreciate) the choose your own adventure books of your childhood, you will be delighted, as our game has kept their spirit while adding modern elements for a deeper immersion.

Please note that in our game it's not possible to go back using your fingers sliding between pages to create save points.

The game won't be a walk in the park, as it takes on average several hours to complete this thrilling adventure – for those who manage to get out alive, but perhaps not unscathed.

One thing is certain: you will never forget your journey through the world of Angor!


BACKUP : Automatic backup of your progress (Without the use of STEAM cloud).

For total immersion in the game, the use of a headset is recommended.

The beginning :

You wake up with a foggy mind!
Distant whispers resonating in your head.
In a comatose state, not knowing what is happening, you hardly open your eyes and slowly look at the room in which you are...
This room is poorly lit by a small kerosene lamp, carelessly placed on one of the shelves to the right of the door facing you. The lamp is at a maximum distance of two meters from you. Made of wood, it is painted in an old faded pink.
One thing is certain, no one but you is here.
The cramped place has rows of shelves, fixed on the walls on each side of the door. They are full of many utensils dedicated to the household. Cloths, buckets, washing mops, household products...
On the end of the second shelf on your left, there is a screwdriver with a wide flat tip and a blue wooden handle.
Near the kerosene lamp, rests a small rectangular wood box with a lid decorated with symbols that seem unknown to you.
You notice that the light is gradually declining. The level of the oil of the lamp must be at the lowest!
What would you like to do?

The rest of the story is just a click away from the "add to cart" button.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for players aged 12 or 16 depending on the rating of some countries. It contains mature themes, including violence and death.

This game contains elements that can shock, such as blood, suffering and imaginary creatures.

Players must be prepared to face this type of content.
